name: Seizure
title: Seizure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of seizure.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of seizure.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts related to status epilepticus.)
